message: I'm a huge fan of greens, whites, oolongs, and reds. One of my all time favorite teas is Adagio's Jasmine #12.
My two daily teas are Ryokucha and Maiden's Ecstasy puerh from Samovar.  I like to try tons of different stuff, but those are the two I always come back to.
Simple good quality sencha. I drink others but sencha is a near daily staple.
